alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 15 at 2:28PM EST until December 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor to locally moderate coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...A brief period of onshore flow around the time of high tide early Sunday morning could lead to minor to low end moderate coastal flooding. This could result in flooding of roadways near the coast and water could potentially surround structures immediately along the coastline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Coastal Flood Watch may be discontinued later tonight should future forecasts show the storm system moving further south and east of Dixie County further decreasing the coastal flood threat.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
